These are the goals we wish to achieve during different development phases

Phase 1: Proof of concept ( 2013.03.12 - 2013.06.27 )

  • Game Core

    • Conversations ✓

    • Quests ✓

    • Flags ✓

    • Basic object interaction ✓

    • Inventory ✓

  • Editor

    • Basic level building ✓

    • Conversation editor ✓

    • Quest editor ✓

    • Flag editor ✓

    • Object and actor editing ✓

  • GUI

    • New UI plugin for Unity ✓

Phase 2: Gameplay and development tools ( 2013.07.01 - ? )

  • Concept art

    • Player

    • Generic male + female

    • First map

  • Animations

  • Game core

    • Upgrade effects

    • Optimisations

    • AI implementation

    • Proper character controls

    • Camera movement and raycasting

    • Trigger logic

    • Basic weapon effects

      • Projectiles

      • Decals

      • Muzzle fire

      • Explosions

  • Editor

    • Improvements to surface editor

    • Scatter surfaces

    • Clear visual cues

    • More view modes in the asset browser

    • Optimisations

  • Prefabs

    • Architecture

    • Furniture

      • Basic modelling

      • Texturing

    • Environment

      • Basic modelling

      • Texturing

  • Story

    • Chapter 1 outline

    • First scene core conversations

  • Level design

    • Scene 1 + initial level build

Phase 4: Playable state
